reviewText: I remember this as the funniest thing I've ever seen, except perhaps the original live "Beyond the fringe".  Why can't they re-issue the series?  It surely wouldn't seem dated.  The whole cast was terrific with Tom Conti as a despicable but irresistable don Juan.  Please, please bring it back on DVD!

I too would love the trilogy on VHS and/or DVD. I too saw it years ago on PBS and almost died laughing many an evening. Had I not found others reviews I might have started wondering if it even existed.
